mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE EMAIL_CERTIFICATION SET C_NUMBER = #{cNumber}, ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM EMAIL_CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND C_NUMBER = #{cNumber}) = 1 THEN NVL( (SELECT '1' FROM EMAIL_CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND ISSUE_DT + (INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) >= SYSDATE) , '2') ELSE '3' END FROM DUAL

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT, MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
